https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/fauu3Ve7BeBk614Jrshi9AneBMf.jpg Bumble the Bear (Olivier Bommel) finds an egg that, it turns out, has a cute little dragon in it. However, this dinosaur grows huge every time it is upset. As this causes a lot of problems, Ollie Bommel has to face a difficult dilemma. Dexter the Dragon & Bumble the Bear
